io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.inversion

クラス Dvector

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.inversion.Dvector

  • public class Dvector
extends java.lang.Object
    Am=d のdに対する情報 TODO 震源観測点ペア

    basicDataFileから Dvectorを構築する

    This class is immutable.

    TODO 同じ震源観測点ペアの波形も周波数やタイムウインドウによってあり得るから それに対処 varianceも

      Use selected waveforms.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • Dvector

        public Dvector(BasicID[] basicIDs)
        Use all waveforms in the IDs. Weighting factor is the reciprocal of the maximum value in each obs time window.
        パラメータ:
        basicIDs - must contain waveform data

      • Dvector

        public Dvector(BasicID[] basicIDs,
               java.util.function.Predicate<BasicID> chooser)
        Use selected waveforms. Weighting factor is reciprocal of maximum value in each obs time window.
        パラメータ:
        basicIDs - must contain waveform data
        chooser - Predicate for selection of obs data to be used

      • Dvector

        public Dvector(BasicID[] basicIDs,
               java.util.function.Predicate<BasicID> chooser,
               java.util.function.ToDoubleBiFunction<BasicID,BasicID> weightingFunction)
        Use selected waveforms.
        パラメータ:
        basicIDs - must contain waveform data
        chooser - Predicate used for filtering Observed (not synthetic) ID. If one ID is true, then the observed ID and the pair synthetic are used.
        weightingFunction - ToDoubleBiFunction (observed, synthetic). If null, the reciprocal of the max value in observed is a weighting value.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getEventVariance

        public java.util.Map<GlobalCMTID,java.lang.Double> getEventVariance()
        戻り値:
        map of variance of waveforms in each event

      • getStationVariance

        public java.util.Map<Station,java.lang.Double> getStationVariance()
        戻り値:
        map of variance of waveforms for each station

      • combine

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector combine(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector[] vectors)
        Every vector must have the same length as the corresponding timewindow.
        パラメータ:
        vectors - to combine
        戻り値:
        combined vectors

      • getDVectors

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector[] getDVectors()
        The returning vector is unmodifiable.
        戻り値:
        Vectors consisting of dvector(obs-syn). Each vector is each timewindow. If you want to get the vector D, you may use combine(RealVector[])

      • getD

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector getD()
        戻り値:
        vectors of residual between observed and synthetics (obs-syn)

      • getLengths

        public int[] getLengths()
        戻り値:
        an array of each time window length.

      • getNpts

        public int getNpts()
        戻り値:
        number of total data.

      • getNTimeWindow

        public int getNTimeWindow()
        戻り値:
        number of timewindows

      • getObsIDs

        public BasicID[] getObsIDs()

      • getObsVectors

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector[] getObsVectors()

      • getObs

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector getObs()
        戻り値:
        vector of observed waveforms

      • getStartPoints

        public int getStartPoints(int i)
        パラメータ:
        i - index of timewindow
        戻り値:
        the index of start point where the i th timewindow starts

      • getSynIDs

        public BasicID[] getSynIDs()

      • getSynVectors

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector[] getSynVectors()

      • getSyn

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector getSyn()
        戻り値:
        vector of synthetic waveforms.

      • getUsedGlobalCMTIDset

        public java.util.Set<GlobalCMTID> getUsedGlobalCMTIDset()

        public java.util.Set<Station> getUsedStationSet()
        戻り値:

      • getWeighting

        public double getWeighting(int i)
        パラメータ:
        i - index for the weighting
        戻り値:
        weighting for the i th timewindow.

      • outOrder

        public void outOrder(java.nio.file.Path outPath)
              throws java.io.IOException
        syn.dat del.dat obs.dat obsOrder synOrder.datを outDirectory下に書き込む
        パラメータ:
        outPath - Path for write
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • outputVarianceOf

        public void outputVarianceOf(java.nio.file.Path outPath,
                             org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector[] vectors)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        vectors（各タイムウインドウ）に対して、観測波形とのvarianceを求めてファイルに書き出す Create event folders under the outPath and variances are written for each path.
        パラメータ:
        outPath - Root for the write
        vectors - RealVectors for write
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • getVariance

        public double getVariance()
        戻り値:
        ∑|obs-syn|2/∑|obs|2

      • getObsNorm

        public double getObsNorm()
        戻り値:
        |obs|

      • getDNorm

        public double getDNorm()
        戻り値:
        |obs-syn|

      • separate

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector[] separate(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector vector)
        パラメータ:
        vector - to separate
        戻り値:
        Separated vectors for each time window. Error occurs if the input is invalid.
